divs: Sighting Details We were (me and my brother)going to home in my car (I was driving the car) when my brother see a small stick alien running (4 mph) in the pavement, He say "What is this", the alien was coming in my car direction, the small alien has 2.3 ft., The entity is small and there are 3 cars in the red traffic sign (stopped), when the traffic sign turns into green I don't wait for nothing putting my car to run faster, I don't know if the small entity was noticed by the other cars.
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Curitiba
There were no other sightings in Curitiba on or around May 13th 2013
